sources.title: Live Translation: Real-Time Video & Audio Translator
sources.snippet: AI-powered real-time translation tool for videos, live streams, and meetings, supporting 50+ languages. Break language barriers effortlessly with Tellus AI, your Chrome extension for instant video translation from any language into yours so that you can unlock the power of communication.

citation_mappings.claim_text: üíª Browser Extensions Live Translation: Real-Time Video & Audio Translator (Chrome) ‚Äì Chrome extension that translates audio from videos, streams, meetings, and web audio in real time (~50+ languages). Chrome Web Store
Real-Time Video & Audio Translation (Byrdhouse/Creati) ‚Äì Similar idea: live translate whatever audio plays in your browser. (Reviews vary.) Chrome Web Store
Speech Translator (Edge) ‚Äì Basic voice translation support via browser (Edge/Kiwi). Microsoft Edge Addons

sources.title: These $140 earbuds translate 50+ languages while you listen
sources.snippet: The Mymanu Orb Open-Ear AI Translation Earbuds, showcased at CES 2026, offer users a unique blend of audio entertainment, real-world awareness, and advanced language translation technology. Priced at $139.99 (down from a $179.99 MSRP), these earbuds feature an open-ear design that allows users to hear their surroundings while simultaneously listening to music, taking calls, or translating real-time conversations. The standout feature is their built-in AI, which supports translation in over 50 languages across live conversations, phone calls, and spoken audio‚Äîideal for travel, work, or multilingual environments. Beyond translation, the earbuds function as typical audio accessories with a sleek, lightweight, and water-resistant design. With up to 35 hours of battery life using the charging case and hands-free controls, they offer a user-friendly and futuristic audio solution without added complexity.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Standalone hardware (like dedicated earbuds with translation features) exists too, but that‚Äôs outside ‚Äúapp/extension‚Äù scope. sfgate.com
